name: Faizan
description: Faizan wo insan hai jo computer ke saamne aise ghoor ke dekhta hai jaise machine se rishtedaari ho. Bug usse dekh kar kehte hain, 'System error to hum hain ya tu hai?'
poetry:
Faizan ka laptop se hai rishta purana,
Code likhta hai woh subah-o-shaam mastana,
Processor jaise ho koi apna rishtedaar,
Bug bhi hote hain uske darbaar se hairan.
character: The Gandu of all the Time

name: Zubair Gujjar
description: Zubair ki intelligence ka jalwa hai aisa ke compiler bhi ijazat mangta hai usse. Magar zindagi ke errors ko handle karna uske bas ki baat nahi.
poetry:
Zubair ka dimaag hai computer se bhi tez,
Code whisper karta hai, har bug rahe pareshan,
Compiler bhi ijazat mange chalney se pehle,
Magar zindagi ke bugs hain uske liye imtehaan.

name: Ammad Pervaiz
description: Class mein late aata hai magar notes uske encyclopedia jaise mukammal hote hain. Koi nahi jaanta woh notes banata hai ya Wikipedia chalata hai, lekin muft ka burger dhundne mein ustad hai.
poetry:
Ammad ke notes hain encyclopedia se kam nahi,
Waqt pe aayen class mein ye mumkin nahi,
Wikipedia ya notes, koi jaane na farq,
Muft ka burger dhundne mein hai ustaad bhi.

name: Affaq
description: Khamoshi se bhara hai magar har kaam dusron se pehle mukammal kar leta hai. Campus mein Google Maps ki zarurat nahi, bas Affaq se pooch lo shortcut ka.
poetry:
Khamoshi hai Affaq ki pehchan sabse bari,
Lekin har kaam kare woh sabse pehle hi,
Google Maps campus mein hai bekaar bilkul,
Usse pooch lo raaste, batayega har gali.

name: Arif
description: Arif ki explanation sunkar professors bhi notes lete hain. Har kisi ko impress karna uske liye itna aasan hai jaise woh MI6 ka koi agent ho.
poetry:
Arif ki zuban se nikle to ilm barse,
Professor bhi notes lein jab woh lecture kare,
Har kisi ko impress karna hai uska hunar,
Jaise MI6 ke agent ka tareeqa ho ye.

name: Basit
description: Basit ke paas wo technology hai jo abhi market mein aayi hi nahi. Uski assignment dekh kar lagta hai product launch ho raha hai, assignment nahi.
poetry:
Basit ke gadgets hain kal se aaj tak,
Market mein aaye na honge ab tak,
Assignment uski product launch jaisi lage,
Technology ka hai woh sachcha aashiq.

name: Ahad
description: Coffee cup hamesha haath mein liye ghoomta hai. Kehta hai 'Maine kuch parha nahi' magar GPA uski Harvard students ko bhi sharminda kar de.
poetry:
Ahad ki coffee hai uska saathi hamesha,
Kehta hai parha nahi, ye hai uska nasha,
Harvard ke students bhi ho jaayen sharmasar,
Jab dekhe uski GPA ka jalwa tamasha.

name: Moeez Mazar
description: Group project ka Modi hai, sab kuch control mein rakhta hai. Uski color-coded schedules dekh kar lagta hai koi bullet journal influencer ho.
poetry:
Moeez jab group project sambhale to kamal kare,
Sab control mein rakhe, har cheez sahi kare,
Color-coded schedule hai uska kaam,
Organization ke fann mein hai woh bemisaal.

name: Yousouf
description: Woh sawal poochta hai jo sab ke zehan mein hote hain magar kisi ko poochne ki himmat nahi hoti. Har teacher ko 'sir' kehta hai, chahe gender kuch bhi ho.
poetry:
Yousouf ke sawal hain dil ki awaz,
Jo sab sochte par poochte nahin,
Har teacher ko 'sir' kehne ka hai andaz,
Dar ke aage jeet hai uska yaqeen.

name: Shoaib
description: Uske bag mein har zaruri cheez milti hai - snacks, power bank, charger, duct tape. Zombie apocalypse aaye to Shoaib ke bag mein chhup jao.
poetry:
Shoaib ke bag mein duniya basi hai,
Snack, charger, duct tape, kya nahi hai,
Zombie apocalypse agar aa jaye kabhi,
Uske bag mein panah lena hi aaqalmandi hai.

name: Zain Kazmi
description: Zain har department ki farewell mein maujood hota hai, lekin koi nahi jaanta ke woh khud kis department ka hai. Campus ka Ranveer Singh hai woh.
poetry:
Zain har farewell pe nachta hai khub,
Kisi ko na pata woh hai kis department ka,
Campus ka Ranveer Singh hai mahboob,
Har mehfil mein hai uska jalwa barqarar.

name: Bilal Ibex
description: Har assignment uski art gallery ka masterpiece lagti hai. Uski presentation dekhkar log khare ho ke taliyan bajate hain, marks to secondary hain.
poetry:
Bilal ki assignment hai fankari ka namuna,
Art gallery mein rakho to bane sheh-para,
Presentation pe taliyan baje zor se,
Marks se zyada hai uska andaz nyara.

name: Mohsin
description: Har kisi ki madad karta hai magar khud kabhi help nahi mangta. Memory itni tez hai ke lecture slides uske DNA ka hissa ban gaye hain.
poetry:
Mohsin ki madad pe sab hain yaqeen karte,
Khud kabhi na mange woh kisi se madad,
Lecture slides hain DNA mein uske shamil,
Yaaddasht mein uski na koi hai had.

name: Burhan Hashimi
description: Debate ka aisa master hai ke professors bhi haar maan lete hain. Har baat ka counter argument rakhta hai, jaise court mein paida hua ho.
poetry:
Burhan ki baaton mein hai daleel bemisaal,
Professor bhi haar maan lein debate mein uske aage,
Har baat ka jawab hai taiyar har waqt,
Court mein paida hua tha woh, yahi hai khayal.

name: Obaid Arshad
description: Study session ka naam hota hai, lekin party ban jaati hai. Notes itne famous hain ke doosre departments mein photocopy hote phirte hain.
poetry:
Obaid ke study session mein hai party ka maza,
Ilm bhi mile aur mehfil bhi saje,
Notes uske hain itne mashhoor har jagah,
Departments mein copy hote, har koi chahe.

name: Arman Ahmad
description: Projector kharab ho ya mouse na chale, duct tape aur paper clip se NASA ka shuttle bana deta hai. Jugaad ka ustad hai woh.
poetry:
Arman ke haathon mein hai jaadu aisa,
Tute projector ko kar de changa foran,
Duct tape, paper clip se banaye jadeed,
NASA bhi hire kare usko, itna hai wohan.

name: Wali Khan
description: Push-up karte huye calculus problems solve karta hai. Physical aur intellectual fitness dono ka master hai.
poetry:
Wali Khan push-up kare aur solve kare calculus,
Jism aur dimagh dono hain fit uske pass,
Physical aur intellectual dono mein hai maahir,
Iss hybrid model ka har koi hai fan khaas.

name: Hamza Ikhlaq
description: Statistics ka lecture bhi stand-up comedy ban jata hai jab woh bolna shuru kare. Notes padhte waqt hasna laazmi hai.
poetry:
Hamza jab statistics parhaaye class mein,
Stand-up comedy ban jaaye har lecture uska,
Notes padhein to hansi aaye be-ikhtyar,
Mizah aur ilm ka hai woh sangam anokha.

name: Haroon
description: Casual baat bhi existential crisis mein badal deta hai. Har guftagu ka anjaam yahi hota hai ke 'kya hum asal mein haqiqi hain?'
poetry:
Haroon se baat karo to sochne lago zindagi ke raaz,
Casual guftagu bhi ho jaaye falsafa-e-hayat,
Har conversation ka anjaam hai yehi sawal,
'Kya hum asal mein haqiqi hain?' yahi hai uski baat.

name: Waleed
description: Teen startups, chaar freelance clients aur perfect GPA - koi aam student nahi, Elon Musk ka junior version hai woh.
poetry:
Waleed ke startups teen aur clients chaar hain,
GPA bhi perfect, har kaam mein hai woh kamyab,
Elon Musk sa junoon hai uske andar,
Entrepreneur ka perfect namuna hai be-hisaab.

name: Obaid Hashmi
description: Cafeteria ka Gordon Ramsay hai. Har bite ka detailed review deta hai aur campus mein har snack ki location usse behtar koi nahi jaanta.
poetry:
Obaid Hashmi cafeteria mein hai Ramsay jaisa,
Har bite ka review de khane walon ko,
Snacks ki location bataye har jagah ki,
Culinary critic hai woh college ka sachcha.

name: Muaz Iqbal
description: 20-page ka research paper ek raat mein likh ke 'A' grade hasil karta hai. Deadline ke saath dosti ho gayi hai uski.
poetry:
Muaz ki qalam se nikle 20 page ek raat mein,
'A' grade hasil kare woh har baar yakin se,
Deadline hai uski dost purani,
Pressure mein perform kare woh kamaal se.

name: Sheraz
description: Lab goggles pehne huye bhi runway model jaisa lagta hai. Har class uske liye fashion show hai, subject koi bhi ho.
poetry:
Sheraz lab mein bhi lage model runway ka,
Goggles pehne fashion icon ban jaaye,
Har class hai uske liye fashion show,
Trendsetter campus ka, har koi pehchane.

name: Nabeel
description: Teen seconds mein koi bhi gaana pehchan leta hai. Har subject ke liye alag playlist banaya hai usne.
poetry:
Nabeel ke kaan sunein teen second mein gaana,
Pehchan le melody, artist, album ka naam,
Har subject ke liye playlist hai alag taiyar,
Musiqui uski rooh mein hai, ye hai uska kaam.

name: Bilal Ikram
description: Society mein aisa hai jaise zahreela saanp ho, shuru mein Zubair ne haath pakad ke chalna sikhaya tha, ab khud sabka haath pakadta hai.
poetry:
Bilal Ikram society mein phirta hai aise,
Jaise zahreela saanp, chaal main jehrili,
Zubair ne sikhaya tha chalna pehle usse,
Ab sabka pakdey haath, ban ke social khilari.

name: Burhan
description: Sports ka data scientist hai. Har match ka score yaad rakhta hai aur apni team ke liye Excel charts banata rehta hai.
poetry:
Burhan ke dimagh mein hai sports ka data,
Har match ka score, har player ka record,
Excel charts banaye team ke liye woh,
Analyst hai aisa, jisse har team kare support.

name: Abdul Hameed
description: Coding problems ko historical wars se relate karta hai. Debugging uske liye Cold War ka top secret mission hai.
poetry:
Abdul Hameed jab code likhe to tareekh ho saath,
Har problem ko war se kare relate bemisaal,
Debugging ho ya error, Cold War sa mission hai,
Chronological coder hai woh, history ka misaal.

name: Ibrahim
description: Finals week mein bhi Buddha ki tarah shant rehta hai. Debugging karte waqt yoga master jaisa calm hota hai.
poetry:
Ibrahim ko dekho finals ke hafton mein,
Buddha sa sukoon hai uske chehre par,
Debugging kare to yogic calm ho jaise,
Stress ka koi asar nahi hai jeevan bhar.

name: Sher Afghan
description: Har weekend ki aisi kahani sunata hai jo professor bhi yakin nahi kar sakte. Theory ko jungle mein practically test karta hai.
poetry:
Sher Afghan ke weekend adventures hain ajeeb,
Professors bhi sun ke ho jaayen hairaan,
Theory ko jungle mein test kare practical,
Academic adventurer hai woh be-misaal.

name: Muzamil Mushtaq
description: Code itna clean likhta hai ke professors textbooks mein shamil karna chahte hain. Har function ke saath love letter jaisi documentation likhta hai.
poetry:
Muzamil ka code hai itna clean aur saaf,
Textbook mein chaape professor har saal,
Function ke saath documentation likhe pyaar se,
Precision programmer hai woh bemisal.

name: Abdul Rauf
description: Har naye student ka unofficial mentor ban jata hai. Concepts ko memes ke zariye samjhata hai aur ajib baat yeh ke sab samajh jaate hain!
poetry:
Abdul Rauf har naye student ka bane mentor,
Ilm ko memes se samjhaye har baar,
Concepts difficult ho ya simple, farq na kare,
Meme mentor hai woh, sabka madad-gaar.

name: Default Student
description: Koi nahi janta ke yeh student asal mein hai bhi ya nahi. Har class mein virtually maujood tha jab yeh trend bhi nahi tha.
poetry:
Default Student hai ya myth, kaun jaane,
Kabhi dekha nahi, par attendance hai naam ka,
Virtual presence thi jab trend nahi tha ye,
Campus legend hai, raaz hai anjaan.
